plugins.name: scratch-skills
plugins.description: Automates Scratch programming via Playwright. Includes skills for VM injection (programmatic block creation) and block dragging (visual UI interaction).

skills.name: scratch-vm-injection
skills.description: Automates Scratch programming by injecting blocks directly into the web editor's VM via Playwright. Enables Claude to programmatically create and run Scratch projects.

skills.name: scratch-block-dragging
skills.description: Builds Scratch programs by dragging and dropping blocks from the palette to the script area using Playwright mouse operations.
